Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.xml.condition

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XmlFileDTD
    The next step in building XmlFile condition after DTD was specified.
    XmlFileIn
    The next step in XmlFile condition definition.
    XmlFileNamespace
    The last step of building the XmlFile condition after the namespace was specified.
    XmlFileResult
    The next step in building XmlFile condition after the regex for xpath result was specified.
    XmlFileXpath
    The building step of XmlFile condition
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    XmlFile
    Handles matching on XmlFileModel objects and creating XmlTypeReferenceModel objects on the matching nodes.
    XmlFileFrom
    Intermediate step for constructing XmlFile instances for a specified ref.
    XmlFileParameterMatchCache  
    XmlFileXPathTransformer
